channel.title: [HELP] Need help with this please
channel.description:
Ok i've been editing my server for a while now and its all been ok until earlier, i don't know what it is but it get an error when compiling it.
[code]Compiling - Please Wait . . . Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Compiling Finished! This window will now close.[/code]
Thats what i get during compilation.
And when i run my server i get this: [code]Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:98)[/code]
When i try logging in, it just like freezes on the client and i can type and my name is nulled so i think it is nulled, Not an expert on this stuff but please if anyone could help me and tell me how to fix that error? (Devolution btw)
Many thanks ~God Of Love.

item.title: [HELP] Need help with this please
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

[quote=“slim811shady, post:11, topic:273575”]Use this to change the prices theres no viruses scan it yourself…downloaded it awhile ago so here ya go

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=BBX419NX[/quote]

Thanks…

But no thanks, ill just change them myself(:
~God Of Love.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Need help with this please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“9d n 1 n e, post:5, topic:273575”]use a different compiler, heres mine …@echo off title Ronaldo's Compiler "C:/Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause(thank ronaldo)[/quote]
Why do people think that different compilers serve different functions? Every compiler has one main function: to convert the Java files into class files, which contain byte code.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Need help with this please
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You edited an item in Item.cfg, delete whatever you recently added in there because you probably have an extra space somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Need help with this please
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

This:

Compiling - Please Wait . . . Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Compiling Finished! This window will now close.

Is not an error!
